# Dominican Republic Billie Jean King Cup team

The Dominican Republic Billie Jean King Cup team represents the Dominican Republic in Billie Jean King Cup tennis competition and are governed by the Federaci√≥n Dominicana de Tenis.  They currently compete in the Americas Zone Group II.
History
Dominican Republic competed in its first Fed Cup in 1990.  Their best result was qualifying for the 32-team main draw in 1990.
